summary: A synthetic dataset that programmatically creates a collection of graphs belonging to eight predefined structural classes (cycle, star, wheel, lollipop, hypercube, grid, clique, circular ladder). The class generates a specified number of graphs with node counts within a configurable range, assigns a class label to each graph, and implements the standard sequence protocol so the data can be indexed, iterated, and batched for graph neural network training.
business_intent: Supply ready‑made, reproducible graph classification data for research and development of graph learning models, enabling rapid benchmarking, model validation, and educational experiments without requiring external data sources.
